rules.title: When beneficiary name contains chevron or shell, categorize transaction as 4 (Auto & Transport)
When mcc is 5811 (Caterers) categorize transaction as 39 (Food & Dining / Restaurants)
Online shopping
Categorize MCC 5812 as Restaurants
Categorize MCC 5411 as Grocery Stores
Categorize supermarket transactions as Food (Lidl, Maxi, Idea, Aman)
rules.predicate: LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%lidl%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%maxi%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%idea%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%aman%'

rules.title: Categorize bills and utilities (EPS, Infostan, Telekom, SBB)
rules.predicate: LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%eps%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%infostan%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%telekom%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%sbb%'

rules.title: Categorize clothing stores (Zara, H&M, Bershka)
rules.predicate: LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%zara%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%h&m%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%bershka%'

rules.title: Categorize pharmacies (Dr Max, Benu, Lilly)
rules.predicate: LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%dr max%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%benu%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%lilly%'

rules.title: Categorize home improvement stores (IKEA, JYSK, Uradi Sam)
rules.predicate: LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%ikea%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%jysk%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%uradi sam%'

rules.title: Categorize tech and electronics (Tehnomanija, Gigatron, WinWin)
rules.predicate: LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%tehnomanija%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%gigatron%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%winwin%'

rules.title: Categorize entertainment platforms (Netflix, Spotify, Deezer)
rules.predicate: LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%netflix%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%spotify%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%deezer%'

rules.title: Categorize fuel stations (OMV, Gazprom, NIS, Lukoil)
rules.predicate: LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%omv%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%gazprom%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%nis%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%lukoil%'

rules.title: Categorize MCC 5969 as Loan Payment Services
Categorize MCC 6011 as ATM Fees
Categorize MCC 4814 as Mobile Phone Services
Categorize payment to PayPal as Financial Services
Categorize education platforms (Coursera, Udemy, Khan Academy)
rules.predicate: LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%coursera%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%udemy%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%khan%'

rules.title: Categorize hair salons and barbers (Frizer, Barber, Haircut)
rules.predicate: LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%frizer%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%barber%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%haircut%'

rules.title: Categorize government tax payments
rules.predicate: LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%porez%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%uprava%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%tax%'

rules.title: Categorize MCC 4111 as Public Transportation
Categorize bookstore purchases (Laguna, Delfi)
Categorize gym memberships (Teretana, X-fit, Synergy)
rules.predicate: LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%teretana%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%x-fit%' OR LOWER("BeneficiaryName") LIKE '%synergy%'

rules.title: Categorize MCC 5499 as Health & Fitness Stores
Categorize MCC 7523 as Parking Services
Categorize MCC 5995 as Pet Food & Supplies
Categorize MCC 7519 as Car Rental Services
Categorize MCC 8299 as Education & Training Services
Categorize MCC 5192 as Bookstores

Categorize MCC 8050 as Medical Services
